entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
